docreview 0.0.1.9000

Set config for docreview checks

Source: R/package_review.R
get_config.Rd

Set config for docreview checks

get_config(
  config_path = system.file("configs", "docreview.yml", package = "docreview", mustWork
    = TRUE)
)

Arguments

config_path

Path to config file

Examples

# Get default configuration
get_config()

#> $error_on_failure
#> [1] FALSE
